translations: n.强行推销的人；小贩；广告撰写员
v.强行推销；叫卖；做小商贩；讨价还价

sentences.sentence: Markets do not want to talk to flacks and hucksters.
sentences.translation: 市场不想与宣传员和小贩对话。

sentences.sentence: Mr Chomsky says those who disagree with his ever-more contentious ideas are either blind or hucksters.
sentences.translation: 乔姆斯基表示，那些不同意他曾更具争议的想法的人都是瞎子或是跳梁小丑。

sentences.sentence: These hucksters will promise you anything to get your business and, in many cases, their hands on your home.
sentences.translation: 这些小商品有所了解你，你会答应和业务，在许多情况下，您手中的家。
